author: ianna
body:
#### PR description:

* Remove legacy ```extractParameters``` member function: replaced by ```parameters```
* Add a special case to handle a Boolean shape parameters
* Consolidate ```nextSibling```. Find the first sibling of the node matching the filter and change an iteration direction to BFS when it's called first time, otherwise return the next matching sibling. Returns false when there are no matching siblings.
* Build history on demand
* Run the DT validation tests automatically

#### PR validation:
